short_summary: Supply of materials and labor for the construction of CCA wooden floating docks and accessories for Grosse Iles fishing harbour.
description: Supply of materials and labor for the construction of CCA wooden floating docks and accessories for Grosse Iles fishing harbour.
full_summary:
### Construction and Installation of Floating Docks in Grosse Iles Fishing Harbor

#### Tender Details

**Reference Number**: CB-894-51455770
**Amendment Number**: 8
**Solicitation Number**: 30004999
**Publication Date**: October 20, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: November 3, 2023, 13:00 ET
**Amendment Date**: November 3, 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date**: November 13, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

#### Tender Status

This tender is expired.

#### Procurement Details

**Procurement Category**: Construction
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Regions of Opportunity

The contract is open to all regions in Canada.

#### Regions of Delivery

The contract is restricted to Quebec (except NCR).

#### Contracting Authority

The contracting authority is Fisheries and Oceans Canada, located at 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, New Brunswick E3C 2M6, Canada.

#### End User

This contract is for the construction and installation of floating docks in the Grosse Iles fishing harbor.

#### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes:

* Supply of materials and labor for the manufacture of floating docks and accessories
* Installation of HDPE dry boxes
* Delivery and installation of floating docks and accessories
* Complete installation of cables, strong arms, and all adjustments onsite

#### Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business

This tender will be conditionally set-aside under the Government of Canada's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids have been received from Indigenous businesses who are certified under the PSIB criteria and listed in the Government of Canada's Indigenous Business Directory.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Karen Dolan at (902) 377-7245 or DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca. Attachments are available at the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22718/grosseiles_fabrication-de-pontons_devis.pdf.
